basics.label: New Business Development Manager
basics.summary: An accomplished leader with a strong background in complex, high-volume and revenue business operations. A proven passion for customer service and operational excellence, demonstrated by extreme dedication and commitment to job duties and responsibilities. Drives positive financial and operational performance through completion utilizing a cross functional team to deliver these objectives to the satisfaction of customers.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Sell and market promotional products to current and prospective customers. Bring new business accounts to the inside sales team for follow up and to build the foundation of new customer sales.
highlights: Selected accomplishments: Provide consultation services to customers to help plan their marketing strategy.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Marketed and sold promotional products to customers. Liaised with senior management at customer locations to determine their overall business strategy as well as their sales and marketing goals and objectives.
highlights: Selected accomplishments: Placed the correct products at customer locations based on their interview responses.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Driving force in the inside sales department, directing new accounts towards qualified inside salespeople. Effectively trained, on-boarded and mentored sales associates to ensure their continued success.
highlights: Selected accomplishments: Managed 95% of graphic work submitted by the sales department
Drafted new policies and procedures for the sales department and new account acquisition department.

awards.title: South Chamber Ambassador of the Month
Promoted from Account Manager to New Business Development
awards.summary: Promotion after nine months of employment

certificates.name: CAS Certification from PPAI
certificates.issuer: Industry Specific Program in Business, Marketing & Sales
